message: Bob, let's be fair and split it 60-40. I think we can both be happy with this deal.
Alice, your offer was a bit unbalanced.  How about a 55/45 split? This accounts for the decreasing value over time and gives us both a better deal in this round.
Bob, considering the inflation, I think a 57-43 split is more reasonable. Let's settle on this before the money loses more value.
